players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Alice, as the detective, did you investigate anyone last night? We need to coordinate to catch the mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and she is the mafioso. Alice, please confirm you're the other villager."
Diana: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie and he is the mafia. We must vote him out."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and I investigated her. She is mafia. Alice, you are the villager. Vote Diana with me."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
